charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1101_0100:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking
around town one day, Nate approached [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ]
with a smile.
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_0200:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Great timing! Battle with me!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_0300:
Look, it’s Nanu and Acerola from Alola!
Nanu’s an Island Kahuna, and Acerola’s
a member of the Elite Four!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_0400:
They’re some of the strongest Trainers in Alola!
And they said they’d battle if it’s two-on-two!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_0600:
Hiya, I’m Acerola! I’m bringing an old royal touch
to Pasio!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_0700:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Mind joinin’ this
kid’s team so we can battle?
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_0800: Come on, now’s our chance! You’ll do it, right?
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_0401_1000: All right! I’m so glad you came here!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_0402_1200:
All right! I know I can count on you if you’re on
my team!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_1300:
OK! [Name:PlayerNickname ] and I will take
you on!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_1400:
These young kids, I tell you... Just brimming with
energy, aren’t ya.
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_1500:
Don’t act like you don’t care, Nanu! You’re really
into it! I’m super excited, too!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1101_1600:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] challenged Acerola
and Nanu to a Pokémon battle!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_1700:
Yay, we won! I was a little worried for a
moment, though!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_1800:
Not bad. You gave this old man a few surprises
here and there, too.
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_1900:
Aw man. Our strength wasn’t an issue, but maybe
our attacks could have been timed a little better.
Sorry ’bout that...
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_2000:
OK! We’ll learn from our mistakes and train
even harder!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_2100:
That way, I can go to Alola and take on the grand
trials myself one day!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_2200:
It was a really good battle! I could tell you were
giving it 100 percent!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_2300:
Yeah, Braviary is known as “the hero of the sky”
in Alola.
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_2400:
The way you challenged us without any hesitation
certainly did that title justice.
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_2500:
All right! Didja hear that, Braviary? These two
superstrong Trainers from Alola just said we
were awesome!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_2600:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], you and Nate are
strong sync pairs with your partner Pokémon! 
And your teamwork was spot-on!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_2700:
Heh, no need to rush. Just keep gaining
more experience.
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_0401_2900:
Yeah! We’ll get so strong, we won’t lose
to anyone!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_0402_3100:
Yeah! And that’s a promise! We’re going to keep
on training here on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_3200: Well, I guess it’s time for us to get goin’ now.
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_3300:
If you ever come to Alola, we’ll be waiting
for you!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_3500:
Man, they were so cool! I’m definitely going to go
to Alola someday!
charaepi_ch0100_00_kyohei/2301_1201_3600: Let’s battle together again when I do!
